title: Sara and Jack
description: Sara just graduated college, and is headed to law school in the fall. For the summer, her mother sent her to Oxford, to "broaden her horizons." Ever the good girl, Sara follows her mother's advice, but that only complicates matters. Jack, a young, rich attorney that Sara met on the flight over to England, shows up one weekend, and teaches Sara what to look for, and what not to.
author: C.E. Todd
